text: hananimkkeseoneun, jong-gyoleul iyulo geudaedeulgwa ssauji anh-assgo geudaedeul-ui geojujilobuteo geudaedeul-eul chubanghaji anh-eun jadeul-ege geudaedeul-i johge daehago geudeul-ege gongjeong-eul gihaneun geos-eul geumhaji anh-eusinola. sillo hananimkkeseoneun gongjeonghan jadeul-eul salanghasinola
